WHY_ME.DESCRIPTION: I am motivated to continuously learn new technologies and develop myself. My ability to solve complex problems and my passion for programming make me a valuable member of your team.

MY_SKILLS.CHALLENGE_TEXT: I am always happy to learn new technologies, just tell me what you need.

MY_PROJECTS.PROJECT_ONE: Jump, rund and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coinsand tabasco salsa to fight against the crazyhen.
MY_PROJECTS.PROJECT_TWO: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

REFERNCE.REFERENCE_HEADER_ONE: Need a teamplayer? Here what my colleagues said about me
REFERNCE.REFERENCE_TEXT: Here what my colleagues said about me
REFERNCE.REFERENCE_ONE: '' He is a trustworhty teamplayer and can cope with the stress of deadline, Structured work and clear code. ''
REFERNCE.REFERENCE_TWO: '' Thomas had to develop, format and deliver content in collaboration with the team members. He is a reliable and friendly person. ''
REFERNCE.REFERENCE_THREE: '' He is a reliable and friendly person. Work in a structured way and write a clear code. I recommend him as a colleague. ''

CONTACT.CONTACT_TEXT: Still not sure if I am the right person for your project? Contact me so I can reassure you. Let us work together
CONTACT.CONTACT_PRIVACY_THREE: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
